main event: Four extremely bright, flaming objects were sighted by pilots during practice night flights at Mather AFB, California.
interesting points: The objects were sighted at an altitude of 25,000 feet, traveling in a northwest to southeast direction at a very high rate of speed.
The objects disappeared at around 15,000 feet in altitude.
The observations were consistent with the known characteristics of meteors.
The objects seemed to move towards and away from the aircraft, but the rate of movement or direction was not discernible.
